Key:
All right, we made it. Seems like we had plenty of
time.
Seems like it. But I'm all sweaty because I ran.

...Sorry about that. I should have checked the time
better.

Phew... Gosh. Shido, you have no sense of planning.
That's no good.

I think you're right. Shido looks serious, but he's
pretty careless at times.
Hey, what's your guys' problem...
We just know you well. That's all.
That's right. We basically know the good and the bad.
When you put it that way, you're making me blush...

Oh, Shido-san. You're quite late today. Not only that,
but school just started... and you have two beautiful
women on each side. You sure are a boy of your age.
Kurumi?! Why are you...?!

What are you so surprised about? I'm your classmate,
so of course I'd be here.
Oh, that's right...

(I recalled a memory from before. The Kurumi in Eden
was a clone based in the shrine.)

(Seems like the one trapping us now has a similar
power to Eden, but... It seems like it hasn't completely
replicated what life was like before.)

That sure seems to be a low-effort answer. Just
because girls like you so easily, your reaction to this
hurts my feelings. I think I'll cry.
S-Sorry. I was just in a daze...

Then, to show your penitence, would you pat my head
now?
Of course not! That'll give people the wrong idea!

My, my, how unfortunate. But Shido-san... Just because
Rinne is back doesn't mean you should let your guard
down.
Right. Thanks.

(...Seems like Kurumi also recognizes Rinne as my
childhood friend.)

"(Come to think of it, in the "My Little Shido 2" game
that Maria was managing, Kurumi was a classmate.)"

(Does that mean, this environment's been replicated?
I don't know...)
...Come to think of it, where's Maria?
Maria-san? She's over there.
Hnrgh... Origami Tobiichi... Is that true?

I'm sure of it. That Rinne Sonogami is a threat. With
her return, there's a large chance that Shido's time
and energy will be jeopardized.

So it's not wise to leave Rinne Sonogami as is.
Tohka Yatogami, you should also set up a trap.

B-But, Rinne is also a precious friend of mine! I can't
betray her...!

You two, please stop. Doing that will only lower your
dignity.
...What? Lower my dignity?

Yes. Dismissing others in order to fulfill your own
desires is not respectable in the general sense.
People may even hate you because of it.
What?! Grrrr... You set me up!

I just offered the best idea in response to a threat.
Whether or not you take action or not is up to you.

You...! I won't let you get away with this, Origami
Tobiichi!
N-No! It's almost time for class, please stay calm...
Haha...

(I couldn't help but laugh. Maria was in the classroom
as if it were completely normal, and she's having fun.
Up until now, I thought it would've been impossible.)

Itsuka-kun, why are you laughing all by yourself so
early in the morning? It's kinda creepy...

I bet you anything he's thinking of a girl he's
abducted!
We must report him to the police immediately!

No, I was just laughing. But for you to say that much
about me is a bit messed up!
It's how you live your daily life, you bastard!

Tohka-chan, Tobiichi-san, Rinne-chan... The Yamai
Sisters from next door, and now a homestay girl?!
You pervert! Super pervert!
What are you doing in my class, anyway?!
(Why does our class have so many annoying people...)
Shido, you're so popular.
Yup. He is everyone's Shido.
That sounds so wrong?!
Oh, really? Hehe.

Shido, we're in trouble. Tohka and Origami's argument
is going off on a stupid tangent. At first it was about
Rinne, but now they're arguing over red bean paste.

Yeah, I noticed. It's the usual, so don't let it bother
you.

(I told Maria not to worry, and patted her head.
Rather... her saying it's a stupid tangent is pretty
messed up. Well, they really shouldn't be fighting...)

Hey, Tohka-chan, Tobiichi-san. It's almost class time,
so you need to sit down.
Got it. I'll return to my seat soon.
G-Grr... Sorry, Rinne... I'll go back to my seat, too.

As long as you guys understand. Come on Shido, you
need to sit down, too.

Got it. Man, it's comforting to have you around,
Rinne.
Huh? Oh... Um, it's not like I do much anyway.

...Tohka Yatogami, you remember this well. This is
how Rinne Sonogami operates.

I see... So this is how you can get Shido to praise
you.
Amazing. Rinne is good.

I don't know... That seems to be a weird way of putting
things, but it's true.

Just as Tohka and Origami say, she must be one
powerful rival. I finally sense it.
Hm? Did you just say something, Maria?
Nothing. I was just talking to myself.

I see. Then let's sit down then. Rinne will bring down
the hammer if we keep at it.
You're right.

(Rinne's here, and so is Maria. It should have been our
first time together like this, but it feels so normal.
It was as if this was the way it's always been.)

(But something still feels strange in my heart. A world
where the two are present must surely exist. But
it's not real...)
Okay, everyone. Let's start homeroom...

(That feeling went away as the school bell rang and
Tama-chan took her place at the front of the
classroom.)
